alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Halifax; Johnston; Nash; Vance; Wake; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 10:56AM EDT until May 27 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Vance County in central North Carolina... Warren County in central North Carolina... Nash County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Halifax County in central North Carolina... East central Wake County in central North Carolina... North central Johnston County in central North Carolina... Franklin County in central North Carolina... * Until noon EDT. * At 1055 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Warrenton to near Louisburg to near Zebulon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Louisburg, Warrenton, Zebulon, Norlina, Dortches, Littleton, Bunn, Red Oak and Spring Hope. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Franklin; Halifax; Johnston; Nash; Vance; Wake; Warren
